name: Free Shipping. Kitchen Nook, Corner Bench Seat With Storage - Farmhouse Bench, Nook No Finish Raw Wood
brandedName: Etsy Free Shipping. Kitchen Nook, Corner Bench Seat With Storage - Farmhouse Bench, Nook No Finish Raw Wood
unbrandedName: Free Shipping. Kitchen Nook, Corner Bench Seat With Storage - Farmhouse Bench, Nook No Finish Raw Wood
description: 30 years of experience building custom made cabinetry. We have the ability to & knowledge to build you the furniture pieces you deserve. UNFINISHED RAW This is a part of our economical line of benches. Built with value in mind. Corner Bench with storage beneath seating. Great space saver. No chairs to clutter the major walkways of your kitchen. Measures 60" x 60" x 18" deep x 16" high. The 16" height allows for a minimum of 3" for seat cushions. Our measurements are based on the "OVERALL" desired length. These "OVERALL" dimensions take into account the 18" deep corner on either side. Example: a 60" x 60" bench cannot fit into a space any smaller than the 60" x 60" footprint. You can always send us the size of the table or the space you are trying to fit the bench into for accurate sizing. Understanding how to order the correct size . Sizing is orientated from left to right when standing in front of the bench & looking at the bench. A 36" x 60" is therefore 36" on the left, overall length, & 60" on the right, again overall length, when standing in front of the bench & looking at the bench. These are overall dimensions when the sections are combined. 18" on the left + the 18" depth of the right = 36" plus two 30" sections to create the 36 x 60. A 48" x 60" bench would be comprised of, for example, 1 - 31" bench on the left & 2 - 30" on the right. this takes into account the corner. See last pic in listing gallery. Cushions not included. prairiewoodworksllc.com Our benches are made out of Maple & Fir plywood & solids to give you the strength & durability that you deserve. Our benches are built to last. These are paint grade benches. Please read our reviews to see what our customers have to say. Assembly Required. We can fully customize these bench seats. We can add drawers or we can leave the area under the bench seat open for a mudroom application. Please let us know your size specifications so that we can provide you pricing. We do not use "soft close" hinges as they do not adequately exist for bench seat tops. While soft close hinges work great in a vertical application, i.e. cabinet doors in your kitchen, they fail to work when the door/lid is in a horizontal position. NOTE When considering the bench or banquette for your home please keep this crucial point in mind. Insist that the bench that you having custom built for you is not made using MDF sheet products, a type of sheet material similar to particle board & is inferior to traditional plywood. MDF is used as a "cost saving" material only. However, it will be labeled as a material that is preferable to solid wood because of its stability over "solid wood", without mention of its comparability to that of plywood. Unfortunately, this material MDF, when exposed to water, will act as a sponge absorb the water & begin to deteriorate the integrity of the bench quickly. The most common scenario is a spilled drink on the floor that would migrate to the contact points of the bench on the floor.

It is power-loomed in Turkey from stain- and fade-resistant polypropylene fibers and is suitable for indoor and outdoor use. This outdoor rug features a pattern of denim blue stripes on a cream background, with light distressing for a classic seaside look. The low pile height of this rug makes it ideal for higher-traffic areas, like a hallway or family room. We suggest pairing it with a rug pad to prevent shifting. Rug Size: Rectangle 2' x 2'11"

name: Alfonso Oriental Aqua Area Rug
brandedName: Kelly Clarkson Home Alfonso Oriental Aqua Area Rug
description: Easy to clean and ready to stand up to high foot traffic, this polypropylene rug is an ideal foundation for your foyer or living room. Made in Turkey, this area rug is machine-woven and features a medium pile height of 0.38'' that easily fits under most doors. Its intricate oriental-inspired motif showcases deliberately distressed details for an antique-inspired touch and features a combination of aqua and beige hues for the perfect pop of color on your floor. Hand-curated by Kelly Clarkson. Rug Size: Rectangle 3'6" x 5'6"

name: Mikell 41" W Polyester Convertible Chair
brandedName: Mercury Row Mikell 41" W Polyester Convertible Chair
description: This foldable chair is the epitome of multi-functional furniture: It transforms from an accent chair to a single bed for overnight guests or your kids sleepovers in a snap. Its built with solid pine and an engineered wood frame and sits on wood legs with a natural finish. This versatile transformable chair is upholstered in 100% polyester over foam providing comfort whether you are sitting or sleeping. This chair is ideal for extra seating in your living room or spare bedroom. Fabric: Light Gray Polyester

brandedName: Ivy Bronx Hibbard Dining Table

Featuring a solid stone top and stunning rich finish stainless steel base, this dining table is durable and stylish, complementing your contemporary home dcor theme while guaranteeing to withstand the wear and tear of daily use for years to come.
aiDescription: The Hibbard dining table from Ivy Bronx, available at Wayfair, is the perfect addition to any home. This unisex dining table is designed to create lasting memories, whether it's hosting family dinners or holiday feasts. With its rectangular silhouette and marble top, it offers both style and functionality. After assembly, it comfortably seats six people, making it ideal for gatherings. Upgrade your dining room with this sophisticated and versatile piece of furniture.

name: Keever 7 Drawer Double Dresser
brandedName: Laurel Foundry Modern Farmhouse Keever 7 Drawer Double Dresser
description: Introducing the Keever 7 Drawer Dresser - a must-have addition to any bedroom! The understated finish showcases the natural wood grain color variation, giving it a lived-in look that is both rustic and charming.Constructed with ball-bearing guides, each of the seven drawers opens and closes smoothly and easily, providing ample storage space for all your clothing and accessories. And the best part? Only partial assembly is required, making setup a breeze.Proven to be a crowd-pleaser and sales leader, the Keever 7 Drawer Dresser features a transitional design that seamlessly blends with any existing decor. Measuring 37.88'' H x 60.00'' W x 18.00'' D, it offers plenty of surface area to showcase your favorite decor pieces or store everyday essentials.Invest in the Keever 7 Drawer Dresser and experience both style and function in one amazing piece of furniture.

brandedName: Mistana Christa Oriental Gray/Ivory Area Rug

It's made from polypropylene, cotton, and polyester, and it features a blue, ivory, and gray color palette that's sure to add a cool look wherever you roll it out. Plus, this rug has a medium 0.35" pile height that works well in low-traffic rooms like the bedroom or nursery, while also being easy to clean with a vacuum or spot treatment. To keep this rug in place, we recommend pairing it with a rug pad. Rug Size: Rectangle 2'3" x 4'

brandedName: Rosdorf Park Cutright 29" Metallic Table Lamp
description: Perfect for illuminating a hand of cards or a late-night read, table lamps are a stylish way to light up your space. Take this one for example: Elevating your space with its glam aesthetic, this piece features a curved resin body, accented by a quatrefoil pattern that offers to layer visual texture in your space. Capped by a black polyester shade, it diffuses light from an included 13 W compact fluorescent bulb, brightening up your space in a globally-inspired style.

name: Mankin 5-Light Shaded Classic / Traditional Chandelier
brandedName: Andover Mills Mankin 5-Light Shaded Classic / Traditional Chandelier

The arms add a touch of accent and connect to five bowl-shaped shades made from marbleized glass for a fresh look. Inside, it accommodates one medium-base bulb (not included) up to 60W. Plus, we love that it's compatible with a dimmer switch, so you can adjust the light from morning to night.

name: Compass Side Table

Stained hardwood base. Solid brass fittings with antique silver metal finish. Glass top compass face. Compass needle is decorative only. Some assembly required.

Because of the intricate process involved in their creation, quantities of these kilims are limited. name: Lauren Ralph Lauren Hand Tufted Wool-Blend Rug
brandedName: Lauren Ralph Lauren Hand Tufted Wool-Blend Rug
description: Color/pattern: blue / ivory Design details: 1/2in pile; hand tufted; cotton backing Suitable for indoor use 80% Wool, 20% Cotton Area rugs can be made from a variety of yarns or a blend of yarns and materials. Read the label on your rug and follow any special cleaning instructions and precautions provided by the manufacturer of your rug. Use rug protectors under the legs of heavy furniture to avoid flattening of your rug pile. Rotating your rug every few months will help relieve areas from excessive wear. Packing and shipping may cause temporary creases in area rugs. To remove them back-roll/reverse roll your rug and allow time for the creases to relax. Wool rugs, especially new wool rugs, may shed. To reduce excessive shedding, vacuum your rug 1-2 times per week in the direction of the pile. Shedding should diminish within several weeks. See the ÔWoolÕ section of Specialty Care for more information. Routine vacuuming is the most important step in maintaining the life and beauty of your rug. It is recommended that you have area rugs professionally cleaned every 1-2 years to remove deep set dirt in high traffic areas. Otherwise, attentive vacuuming will significantly extend the life of area rugs. Vacuum thoroughly at least once a week with a canister vacuum. Do not engage beater bars. Rugs placed in high traffic areas of the home, office or rugs exposed to household pets should be vacuumed more frequently. Avoid vacuuming the fringes of your rug, especially those on hand-knotted rugs. Use a broom to clean fringes. Use a clean cloth and press firmly to absorb as much liquid as possible. Do not rub! This can set the stain deeper into the rug, making it harder to remove and increasing the chances that the stain will re-appear. Imported Please note: Measurements were taken by hand and are approximate; Please allow for slight variations.

That’s the first thing our co-founder Darryl Sharpton’s Nigerian friends said to him when he discovered his West African heritage. Like many Black Americans, Sharpton knew nothing about his ancestry, until August 2019 when he felt the urge to go on a quest to discover his true roots. He took a DNA test and unearthed a new part of himself; a part he felt drawn to, another home, another birthplace on the other side of the world. Eager to integrate more of the culture into the world around him, he wanted to feel closer to the excitement and vibrance of West African life. For vacuuming, use a vacuum cleaner without a beater bar or one where you can set the bar to the highest pile setting. If your vacuum has variable power settings, set on low. Vacuum full length of the rug, turn and repeat to the next area, rather than back and forth motion. Made in Turkey Please note: Measurements are approximate. Please allow for slight variations.

name: Manhattan Comfort Cooper Ladder Desk With 2 Floating Shelves In Black
brandedName: Manhattan Comfort Cooper Ladder Desk With 2 Floating Shelves In Black
unbrandedName: Cooper Ladder Desk With 2 Floating Shelves In Black
description: Color/finish: black matte Part of the Cooper collection The Cooper ladder desk offers the best of both worlds, with space for tucking away books or electronics, and open shelving making important work accessories easily accessible, while the rest is all business and expert design. An open desk area is perfect for checking off tasks in style, displaying framed photos, and getting the job done with an open drawer section that makes storing laptop or notepads easy. Great in a bedroom, off the kitchen, or living space, the cooper desk instantly offers office and storage with flair. Add your favorite chair and settle in. Mid-Century - Modern Ladder Bookcase Desk for Living Room and Office Use. Fixed Shelves shelf MDP frame Upon Assembly, Measures: 36.61 in. Length, 72.04 in. Height, 17.51 in Depth. name: Marcello Drum 1 Coffee Table
brandedName: Joss & Main Marcello Drum 1 Coffee Table
description: This round coffee table adds an effortlessly cool vibe to your living space with its mother of pearl accents. It's crafted from engineered wood, and it showcases a geometric mosaic design in bright blue and white hues. We love how its slightly inset base offers just the right amount of dimension without overwhelming your decor. Best of all, this table arrives fully assembled, so you can skip straight to the fun part styling.

name: Aulii Oriental Gray Area Rug
brandedName: Williston Forge Aulii Oriental Gray Area Rug
description: With its traditional yet modern pattern and stylish colorway, this affordable piece is perfect for any room you're home. Featuring a soft, high pile, it is woven in Turkey. This easy-to-clean, no-shedding option is great for busy living rooms, dining rooms, entryways, bedrooms, or any area - even high-traffic spaces! Rug Size: Rectangle 5'3" x 7'

name: Tov Furniture Remy Black Velvet Swivel Chair
brandedName: TOV Furniture Remy Black Velvet Swivel Chair
description: Color/finish: black upholstered Part of the Black collection Comfort, Swivel, Fab style; need we say more? The Remy chair's sturdy kiln-dried pine frame and high-density foam fill offer comfort and durability and its plush velvet upholstery is all the invitation we need. Available in multiple color options to complement your space. Measures 25.5in x 27.1in x 28.3in 20.8 x 22.6 x 16.1in seat Velvet, Pine, Plywood Spot Clean Only Imported

name: Suzette 1 - Light Single Globe Pendant
brandedName: Mistana Suzette 1 - Light Single Globe Pendant
description: This pendant light lets you add a warm, welcoming glow to your kitchen island, entryway, or living room. Crafted from steel, it features a slim central rod surrounded by a clear glass shade with a gourd shape and a fluted texture. Inside, it suits a single 60W standard bulb (sold separately), while up top, it hangs from a sloped ceiling-compatible canopy and a height-adjustable downrod. Best of all, it's compatible with dimmer switches, so it's easy to set just the right mood wherever you add it. Finish: Satin Nickel

name: Barnwell 20" Table Lamp
brandedName: Beachcrest Home Barnwell 20" Table Lamp
description: This 20" table lamp features a bold base that adds an airy, coastal vibe to spaces of all sorts. The base is made from textured glass with a striking round silhouette and in the gorgeous solid finish of your choice. The base is highlighted by the gleaming silver neck and topped with a cylindrical hardback drum-shaped shade in a neutral finish. Easy to operate with the rotary socket switch, this lamp accommodates a single bulb up to 60W (sold separately). Base Color: Green Meadow

name: Minnetrista 30" Single Bathroom Vanity Set
brandedName: Andover Mills Minnetrista 30" Single Bathroom Vanity Set
description: This 2.5' wide single bathroom vanity set lets you add style and storage to your bathroom. It's made from solid wood and has a neutral finish that complements all sorts of color palettes. A drawer helps organize your bathroom essentials, as does the two-door cabinet with an adjustable shelf inside. We love the honed white marble countertop and backsplash and included a white ceramic sink that gives it a fresh, clean feel. Drain assembly, faucet, mirror, and P-trap are sold separately. Finish: Gray

name: Tinsman Green Indoor / Outdoor Area Rug
brandedName: Sol 72 Outdoor Tinsman Green Indoor / Outdoor Area Rug
unbrandedName: Tinsman Green Indoor / Outdoor Area Rug
description: This indoor/outdoor rug features bold, circular floating medallions that bring a vibrant look to your space. These floral blooms come in a collection of green, orange, and blue tones over an off-white background. Power-loomed from water- and stain-resistant polypropylene, this area rug's 0.28" pile height makes it an ideal foundation for living rooms, entryways, and covered patios. Even with a jute backing, we recommend pairing it with a rug pad (sold separately) to keep it from shifting underfoot. Rug Size: Rectangle 3'3" x 5'

brandedName: Travelpro Rollmaster™ Lite 28" Expandable Large Checked Hardside Spinner Luggage
unbrandedName: Rollmaster™ Lite 28" Expandable Large Checked Hardside Spinner Luggage

aiDescription: Introducing the Rollmaster™ Lite 28" Expandable Large Checked Hardside Spinner Luggage from TRAVELPRO. This unisex suitcase, available at Nordstrom Rack, is perfect for fashion-forward travelers. With its durable hardside construction and spinner wheels, this luggage is designed to withstand the rigors of travel. The adjustable height control and lightweight design make it easy to maneuver, while the spacious interior and additional packing space ensure you can pack all your essentials. Stay organized with the zippered divider panel and additional compartments. Travel in style and convenience with this sleek and functional luggage. Imported.

name: Personality Boss Lady Needlepoint Pillow
brandedName: Jonathan Adler Personality Boss Lady Needlepoint Pillow
description: Put it all out there - our Needlepoint Personality Pillows announce your innermost identity in bold bars of color. Each pillow is embroidered by hand and backed in luxe velvet. Forget the fusty needlepoint of yore and embrace our sharp, chic world.

name: Courchevel 34.5" W Polyester Armchair
brandedName: Kelly Clarkson Home Courchevel 34.5" W Polyester Armchair
description: This armchair brings a French country look to your living room or den with its turned front legs and rolled arms. Its frame is made from solid and engineered wood, and the legs have a deep walnut finish for a rustic touch in your space. This 34.5" wide chair has a square back and a removable and reversible seat cushion with deep seating that's upholstered in polyester with foam filling for lots of support while you sit. The back cushion is attached. Plus, we love that this chair includes all the tools you need for fuss-free assembly.Hand-curated by Kelly Clarkson. Body Fabric: Navy Polyester Blend

name: Bethesda Drapery Panel - 50"W x 108"L
brandedName: Ballard Designs Bethesda Drapery Panel - 50"W x 108"L
description: "Ikat is an ancient dyeing technique used throughout the world to create soft geometric patterns that look as fresh and on-trend today as they did centuries ago. Our Bethesda Drapery Panel is printed in a Ikat pattern of blue, indigo, sky and white on crisp linen blend. Frame your windows with these designer drapes to give them instant global sophistication. Hangs from 3"" rod pocket or hidden tabs.Bethesda Drapery Panel features: Ikat curtain panel. Cotton lined for privacy & sun protection. Made in the USA."
aiDescription: Introducing the Bethesda Drapery Panel by Ballard Designs, a stunning addition to your home decor. This Ikat curtain panel showcases the timeless beauty of the ancient dyeing technique, with its soft geometric patterns in shades of blue, indigo, sky, and white. Made from a crisp linen blend, these designer drapes will instantly elevate the look of any room. With a 3" rod pocket or hidden tabs, hanging them is a breeze. Plus, they are cotton lined for privacy and sun protection. Made in the USA, these drapery panels are the perfect blend of style and functionality.

With a white fabric drum shade that contrasts the lines of the base, this lamp is the ideal piece anywhere you need to shed a little extra light. Hand-curated by Kelly Clarkson. Size: Queen

Nonalcoholic. Made in Germany.

name: Cici 2 Drawer Nightstand
brandedName: Kelly Clarkson Home Cici 2 Drawer Nightstand

This table is made from a blend of solid and engineered wood, and it features a heavily scored and distressed natural finish for a vintage look and organic appeal. As for storage, it has a felt-lined shelf up top for more delicate items, while lower storage cabinets roll out on metal glides, offering room for books, reading, glasses, and chargers. Plus, this nightstand comes with brass-finished handles for an extra layer of French country charm. Hand-curated by Kelly Clarkson.

It comes in muted blue, gray, and beige tones to complete this antique-inspired look. Hand-tufted in India from 100% wool, this indoor area rug's 0.5" pile height brings a plush foundation to low-traffic areas like your bedroom or home office. Even though it has a cotton and latex backing, we recommend pairing it with a rug pad (sold separately) to keep everything in place. Rug Size: Runner 2'3" x 8'
aiDescription: Introducing the Arlott Oriental Handmade Tufted Wool Blue/Gray/Beige Area Rug by Lark Manor, available at Wayfair. This exquisite rug showcases a stunning center medallion and intricate floral motifs, drawing inspiration from traditional Kazakh and Persian designs. Crafted from 100% wool in India, it boasts a plush 0.5" pile height, making it perfect for low-traffic areas like bedrooms and home offices. For added stability, pair it with a rug pad (sold separately). Rug Size: Runner 2'3" x 8'. Elevate your space with this timeless piece.

name: Kingsville 88.49" Velvet Round Arm Sofa
brandedName: Rosdorf Park Kingsville 88.49" Velvet Round Arm Sofa
description: The contemporary velvet sofa is a wonderful addition to the modern household. The soft velvet upholstery and vibrant color of the couch will surely gather attention at your next social gathering. The delivers a luxurious seating experience with soft performance velvet upholstery. The sofa is padded with dense foam padding for the highest quality of comfort. Part of the collection, this beautiful chair features acrylic legs that assure durability without compromising on style. The sofa's solidly constructed plastic frame rests with secure precision on four sturdy acrylic legs and supports up to three people. Pair the sofa with the accompanying chair and loveseat to create a more cohesive living room look. We stand by the quality, craftsmanship, and integrity of our products by offering a 1-year for all our products. We want our customers to enjoy our product and we will always be there to help with our top-notch customer service support. Upholstery Color: Blue

name: Ayyoub Geometric Blue Area Rug
brandedName: Wade Logan Ayyoub Geometric Blue Area Rug
description: Bold and contemporary, this high-low area rug sets a modern foundation in your living room or den. It features a dynamic, geometric pattern with Greek key-inspired lines in blue and white hues. Power-loomed from a blend of chenille and viscose, it cushions your floors with a low 0.25'' pile that doesn't trip up your feet or your vacuum. Best of all, it's safe to place on heated floors. Although it comes with a jute backing, we recommend adding a rug pad to keep it from shifting and sliding. Rug Size: Rectangle 5' x 8'

unbrandedName: Dashiya 10 - Light Unique / Statement Geometric Chandelier

This modern chandelier that looks more like art than a lamp is designed with a curvy chrome metal rod with clear glass rod branches. Nestled within the architectural display are ten bulbs that cast an inviting glow.

unbrandedName: Reese Solid Wood Low Profile Standard Bed

brandedName: Gracie Oaks Pigg Handwoven Wool Cream Rug

Upholstered in soft polyester fabric with a plush microfiber feel, this piece has comfortable spring and foam-filled seat cushions and pillowy back cushions that will make the Palisades storage sectional a favorite relaxation destination in your home. The sectional has a gas lift seat frame that hides a storage space that is approximately four inches high. Gas lift technology allows for safe access to the storage area as the frame is easy to open and will not slam shut. The entire 86 inch wide sectional arrives in one amazingly compact and eco-friendly box with easy-to-follow instructions, so delivery and assembly are simple. Upholstery Color: Gray

name: Ducote 91" Sofa with Reversible Cushions
brandedName: Lark Manor Ducote 91" Sofa with Reversible Cushions

For the best burn experience, keep the following in mind: The first time you light your candle, allow it to burn until the wax pool melts all the way to the edge; for a larger candle, this may take several hours. Wax has " memory," so if it is extinguished with a partial pool, that will prevent a full, even pool from forming in the future. Trim your wick each time you light the candle, removing any " bloom" from the previous burn. We recommend lighting a wick that is 1/4-1/2" in length. Ensure that your candle is placed on a heat-safe surface. Do not allow wick trimmings, dust, or other materials to accumulate in the wax pool. description: Experience the superior quality and longevity of SoHo Urban Artist's Professional Unprimed Linen Canvas Roll. This medium texture loose unprimed canvas roll is perfect for artists who prefer to prime their own canvas, providing a raw canvas surface that's ready to take on your unique touch. The canvas roll is made from professional quality, archival linen, ensuring the fibers will survive for centuries if properly cared for. The canvas material by the yard is perfect for creating both large and small masterpieces. The #38 linen used in this roll is 10% heavier than #42, making it a sturdy choice for all kinds of artworks. Although the #38 linen can be used for portraiture, we generally do not recommend it for this purpose. This unstretched canvas roll is a versatile choice for artists, providing a blank slate for all types of painting mediums. Whether you're working with oil or acrylic, the natural canvas roll offers a stable and durable surface for your creative endeavors. The raw canvas for painting can be cut to size, allowing for custom-sized pieces or used as a long canvas for larger projects. The unstretched canvas for painting is also perfect for those who prefer to stretch their own canvases, offering the flexibility to create custom-sized pieces that are tailored to your specific needs. The unprimed canvas roll can be primed to your preference, offering flexibility and control over your artwork's initial surface. The canvas fabric for painting retains its natural color.

To calculate the square footage of your space, we recommend combining the width of each wall, then multiplying this number by your ceiling height. unbrandedName: Bipasha 28.75'' Wide Genuine Leather Manual Club Recliner

unbrandedName: Maven Lane Theo Wooden Sideboard in Antiqued Finish
